channel.title: bbcnews TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: Mayor of London Sir Sadiq Khan said Donald Trump has shown he is "racist, sexist, misogynistic and Islamophobic" after the US president made comments about him to the United Nations. The White House has been approached for comment. #SadiqKhan #London #Don

item.title: Aalborg airport in Denmark was temporarily closed when drones were seen in its airspace. Three other smaller airports in the southern region - Esbjerg, Sønderborg and Skrydstrup - also reported drone activity, but were not closed. #Aalborg #Denmark #Drone

item.title: President Trump has signed an executive order that will hand TikTok's US operations to a group of investors. It is still not clear how much the investors will pay TikTok's parent firm, ByteDance. #DonaldTrump #PresidentTrump #USPresident #POTUS #JDVance #
